cgcloud__Route_Account__c.name: cgcloud__Route_Account__c
cgcloud__Route_Account__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between routes and customers.

cgcloud__City__c.description: Shipping city of the linked account

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the Detail page of the Route Customer record.

cgcloud__Sequence__c.description: Sequence or Order of the record that's used for sorting.

cgcloud__Street__c.description: Shipping street of the linked account.

cgcloud__Visit_Template__c.description: ID of the referenced visit template.
